CustomField.description: This field is used to designate Industrial Account category for this account; National or Major Account Field Type: IA Integrated: Y
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates the type of Industrial Account; National or Local/Major Account. Billing Preference defaults based on this setting. Entered initially in Salesforce and sent to IA. IA will override SF if different.
CustomField.label: >National or Major Account
